logoutWarning.title: Unsaved Changes
logoutWarning.description: You have unverified images that will be lost if you logout. Are you sure you want to continue?

chat.title: Chat Support
chat.welcome1: Hello! How can we help you today?
chat.welcome2: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions about vehicle tax exemption.
chat.fileUploaded: I see you've uploaded "{{file}}". Our team will review this document shortly. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about it?
chat.fileDeleted: I notice you've removed some files. Let me know if you need help with uploading new documents.
chat.autoReply: Thank you for your message. Our team will review your request and get back to you shortly.

upload.title: Upload Documents
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, JPEG, PNG, DOC (Max 10MB)
upload.allVerified: All required documents have been verified
upload.startHint: Start by uploading and verifying your first document
upload.modalDescription: Would you like to place a paid order?
upload.warningMessage: Deleting verified documents will interrupt the entire verification process. Do you want to proceed?
upload.alreadyPaidMessage: Your payment is confirmed. No further action is needed.
upload.reloadMessage: You have unverified images that will be lost if you reload. Are you sure you want to continue?

payment.waiting: Please be patient for a moment.
payment.creating: Your postage stamp is being created.
